description: To save a backup of your tax return in TaxAct 2018, select File → Backup... and name your file. You must save your tax return as a TA8 file before creating your backup. To restore a backup in TaxAct 2018, select File → Restore Backup... and navigate to the location of your BA8 file.

Since annual tax returns are filed for the previous year, the BA8 file is created in 2019, typically from the beginning of January to April 15. Once you have completed a tax return, you can either print and mail in the tax forms or file electronically.
